venue.address_2: (Teele Square; just steps from Davis Square)
venue.name: PJ Ryans

item.description: Let's get together to celebrate the changing of the guard on our beloved Tufts campus.  We'll gather at a local watering hole, PJ Ryan's Pub, over on Holland Street in Teele Square for some appetizers and a few cold beverages.  We can discuss the President's inauguration as well as our hopes and dreams for Tufts' future--can you say double digit merit increases?  Hey, a fella can dream, can't he?
item.how_to_find_us: Tufts Meet-up Signs on our table(s).
item.name: Unofficial Presidential Inauguration Happy Hour Bash
